screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .templ file in Titel
screenshot.caption: TEMPL file open in Titel

description: Titel allows users to tag .MP3 files with a variety of metadata, which is inserted into the files. This metadata then appears in music libraries and media players, making the tagged MP3 files easier to sort and identify.

If a Titel user knows they're going to add similar metadata to a group of MP3 files, they can save that metadata (or a subset of it) as a Titel template. These TEMPL files are plain text files, which store saved tags in the order in which they appear in Titel.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .templ file in Titel
images.caption: TEMPL file open in Titel
